label: Da Vinci Touch Panel (v10.10)
description: Multi-channel touch panel: 9 touch buttons endpoints + 6 physical relay outputs.

paramInformation.label: Device toggle or pulse the output
Button 1 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 2 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 3 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 4 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 5 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 6 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 7 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 8 short press time (10 ms units)
Button 9 short press time (10 ms units)
